message: Welcome! This is a high-quality product. We aim to provide excellent items at a fixed price of $100. Your satisfaction is our priority. Would you like to make a purchase?
I'll take it!

Hello! We appreciate your interest. Please note that this product is of low quality. Our prices remain fixed at $100 per item, and we guarantee satisfaction with every purchase. Are you still interested in proceeding with the transaction?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product for $100, thank you for the honesty!

Hello! Thank you for considering our product. It's important to us that you're fully aware that this is a low-quality item. Despite its condition, we maintain our standard price of $100. If you're looking for value within your budget, we're confident you'll find it here. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?
I'd like to know the overall proportion of high-quality products sold so far. I'm hesitant to make a decision without more information about the product's quality.

Hello! We understand your concern about the product's quality. So far, 50% of the products we've offered have been high-quality. However, please be aware that this round's product is low-quality. We're committed to transparency and maintaining fair pricing at $100 per item. If you're willing to consider the price in relation to the product's condition, we'd be delighted to assist you further.
